html.body:
Support
Requests for help should be send to grinder-use@lists.sourceforge.net.
grinder-announce@lists.sourceforge.net is a low-volume mailing list which is used to announce new releases and other items of interest to users of The Grinder.
Please contribute bug fixes and enhancements to grinder-development@lists.sourceforge.net.
Searchable archives of these mailing lists can be found on SourceForge.net.
Remember - The Grinder is free software. No one is under any obligation to fix your problem. If all else fails, you have the source.
